text:
Uri London    |  050-638-5397  |  ulondon@gmail.com  
 
Summary 
Completing a Ph.D in Physics , with expertise in quantum mechanics, nonlinear ph ysics and 
interferometry. 
8200  alumnus with a high technical orientation, analyti cal thinking and background in programming 
and simulations .

A pioneering company for VOIP solutions.
